game.title: The Lost City of Eldarath
game.objective: Explore the ancient ruins and retrieve the legendary Sword of Light
game.description: Rumors have been circulating about a hidden city deep within the nearby forest, where an ancient civilization once thrived. The city is said to hold many secrets and treasures, including the fabled Sword of Light, which is rumored to be able to vanquish any darkness.
game.reward: 1000 gold coins, experience points, and the Sword of Light
game.quest-giver: Elder Thorgrim, village elder of Oakwood Village

task.objective: Gather information about the location of the Lost City
task.description: Talk to the villagers and gather any clues or rumors that may lead you to the lost city. You can start by speaking with the village elder, Elder Thorgrim.

task.objective: Navigate through the forest and find the entrance to the Lost City
task.description: Use your knowledge of wilderness survival to navigate through the dense forest. Keep an eye out for any landmarks or ancient structures that may lead you to the lost city.
task.location: The forest, approximately 1 mile east of Oakwood Village

task.objective: Retrieve the Sword of Light from the heart of the Lost City
task.description: As you enter the lost city, be cautious of traps and ancient guardians. Make your way to the central chamber, where the Sword of Light is said to be hidden.
task.location: The heart of the Lost City
